CONTROLLER_AGENT_NOT_FOUND: The controller agent you are trying to get does not exist
DAO_NOT_FOUND: The ${1} you are trying to get does not exist
DAO_VARIABLE_ALREADY_EXISTS: ${1} with this ${2} already exists, please try again with a different ${2}
NOT_VALID_ACCESS: not a valid value for access, access can be Enabled or Not Set or Disabled
NOT_VALID_ACCESS_TYPE: not a valid value for access type, access type can be Normal or Not Set or Admin
NOT_VALID_EDIT: not a valid value for edit, edit can be All or Not Set or None
NOT_VALID_VIEW: not a valid value for view, view can be All or Not Set or None
NOT_VALID_DELETE: not a valid value for delete, delete can be All or Not Set or None
INVALID_ROLE_NAME: role name can contain aphlabets and numbers only, please try again
INVALID_ROLE_NAME_SIZE: role name should be less then 30 characters
NOT_VALID_FIELD_PERMISSION_LEVEL: the value provided for field permission is not valid, please try again with Read/Write or Not Set or Read
ROLE_PERMISSION_REQUIRED: Atleast one role permission is requied to save the role
INTERNAL_ERROR: Internal server error, please contact support
INVALID_TIMEZONE: The ${1} is invalid, please try again with proper timezone
SOURCE_LANGUAGE_DOES_NOT_EXIST: The source language wanted does not exist
